name: (Duck Sword)
description:
Weird "non-text" game about a duck and a sword.

Made for the Game Jam:

I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story

by Vallamp and Lorda_GD.
Music by: Karl Casey @ White Bat AudioVallamp's Twitter
Lorda's Twitter
Please inform me about random bugs, all criticism is accepted, this is my second attemp at making a game (and also the first 3D one lol).
